topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555e1ee36368720aa0951600#post_555e1ee36368720aa0951600
Dude; no, stop stop stop for a second cause there's something about human sexuality that apparently they never taught you in human sexuality class.

Biologically speaking most people have a sexual predisposition towards certain aspects sexually towards thinking certain facial features and that are sexually attractive.  Essentially contrary to popular belief no matter how much people complain about this sort of thing most people aren't color blind when it comes to what they find attractive.  The only people that are color blind when it comes to what they find attractive are the ultra horny bunch that want to bang everyone and anything that moves.

That's not so much "racism (tm)" so much as that is what the mod author's individual preference sexuality wise is.  Would you say that a African American that finds Caucasians sexy to be racist?  Would you say that a Caucasian person to find Asians sexy to be racist?  Would you say that someone finding Hispanics to be sexy to be racist?  If you say yes to any of this then you've called the overwhelming majority of the human race "racists".

The problem is that you're thinking that assuming that anyone who has a sexual disposition towards certain facial features is racist and assuming people to be racist until proven innocent.  That would be like claiming that cause someone likes women with thin noses that means they're racist.

The problem with your logic is that you're assuming people are racist until proven innocent.

Before you claim that someone is racist give actual proof that someone is racist; what I mean by this is that if you can find the mod author posing for pictures in a kkk hood while teaching people how to make nooses then I will believe you that the mod author is racist, but until then you're coming off as a huge shitlord.  I will admit that racism is still a major issue in the world, *BUT* don't assume people are automatically racist until proven innocent.



Tl:dr; show me proof that the mod author is racist.

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555e23196368722fe1e92b00#post_555e23196368722fe1e92b00
Then i find there pursuit of sexual stimulus crosses a moral line, such things should be reserved for Pornographic works, turning Vivienne white is no different then making a mod where you convince Krem to give up his gender identity and be a woman, it crosses a line and has no place within the original work, and the Companies should out right condemn it, 

Hopefully if mods really do go payed and the companies thus put an end to free mods as they now have value to the Copyright holders such things will become unheard of, and i now find myself in favor of Mods becoming for Profit,
